entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.7.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] This release provides an API endpoint to retrieve statistics from VoucherVault.

Useful if you want to display some stats in your dashboards like Home Assisstant or Homepage.

More information in the official wiki.

Features

  • add api stats endpoint (86f5a8e)
